title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, high-performance developer portfolio showcasing full-stack projects and UI/UX work. Built using React 19 and TailwindCSS, with Three.js and Framer Motion integrated for immersive 3D visuals and smooth animations. Features include SEO optimization, fully responsive layouts and fast load times.

title: HiRevo - AI Interviewer Platform
description: A modern platform for developers to share, discover, and collaborate on code snippets. Features secure authentication, multi-language support (70+), real-time collaboration, and notification system. Built with Spring Boot backend and React frontend.

title: PathAI :- AI powered Career Coach Platform
description: Premium Organic Food E-commerce Platform with comprehensive features including product browsing, shopping cart, JWT-secured authentication, admin dashboard for customers, orders, inventory, and analytics. Integrated with Cloudinary for image management.

title: DavTalk :-  Chat application
description: Modern online footwear platform with React.js + Node.js/Express + MongoDB. Features include product filtering/search, shopping cart, checkout, wishlist, order history. Delivered responsive, user-friendly shopping experience and efficient admin system.

title: Magma :- Estate Website
description: Desktop-based system for optimizing restaurant operations and enhancing customer experience. Features table reservations, customer profiles & loyalty, billing & invoices, employee management, revenue & customer analytics.
